featured.headline: Nimble raises $47M to give AI agents access to real-time web data
featured.summary: Nimble uses AI agents to search the web, verify and validate the results, and then clean and structure the information into neat tables that can then be queried like a database....

secondary_1.headline: Canva acquires startups working on animation and marketing

secondary_2.headline: A Meta AI security researcher said an OpenClaw agent ran amok on her inbox
